description: Introducing amFilm Premium Screen Protector Film Matte Clear (Anti-Glare)for New Kindle PaperwhiteamFilm (TM) Premium Screen Protector for Kindle Paperwhite is made from superior quality 3-layer PET film, and specifically designed to fit Kindle Paperwhite and Kindle. It not only effectively reduces glare and fingerprint, but also protects the screen from daily scratches, dust and scrapes. With self-adhering surface, the film is designed for easy application and zero-to-minimal bubbles during application. A squeeze card is also included to remove the occasional bubble easily.Works with:Kindle, Kindle Paperwhite, Kindle Paperwhite 3G.Contains:3x Screen Protector , Micro-Fiber Cleaning Cloth, Squeeze cardColor:Matte Clear (Anti-Glare, Anti-Fingerprint)Application:Each of the screen protectors contains 3 layers of PET film. The first and last films are mask films, where the stickers are affixed. The actual screen protector for your device is the film in the middle. Please use the stickers to remove the mask films (NOT the stickers themselves).Warranty:30 days Money Back GuaranteeLifetime Replacement Warranty
